/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. Power lines stretch across the sky, following the curve of the road. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the soft light of the day. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
